text: My mobile internet has been really slow for the past few days.
reply: I'm sorry to hear about the slow internet. Could you please share your location so I can check for any network disruptions in your area?

text: I keep getting call drops when I talk to people.
reply: That’s frustrating. We’re currently optimizing our towers in some regions. Please confirm your location so we can raise a service ticket.

text: How can I recharge my prepaid number?
reply: You can recharge through our mobile app, website, or any UPI platform. Would you like me to send you the recharge link?

text: I want to upgrade to a 5G data plan.
reply: Sure! You can upgrade via the app under ‘My Plans’ → ‘Upgrade’. Would you like me to list available 5G plans?

text: My postpaid bill seems higher than usual this month.
reply: Let me help you check that. Could you confirm your mobile number so I can review the last bill details?

text: The network is not available in my area.
reply: Apologies for the inconvenience. Please share your area pincode so I can check the network coverage status.

text: I need help activating international roaming.
reply: Sure! You can activate international roaming from our app under ‘Roaming Services’. Would you like me to guide you through it?

text: Can I get a detailed breakdown of my bill?
reply: Of course. You can download your detailed bill from the app’s ‘Billing’ section or I can email it to your registered address.

text: My SIM card stopped working suddenly.
reply: Please try reinserting the SIM and restarting your phone. If the issue persists, we can arrange a SIM replacement.

text: The internet is disconnecting every few minutes.
reply: I understand that’s annoying. Could you confirm if this happens indoors or outdoors? This helps us diagnose connectivity strength.

text: How can I check my data usage?
reply: You can check data usage in the mobile app dashboard or dial *199#. Would you like a link to the usage page?

text: My number is not receiving OTP messages.
reply: Please ensure SMS services aren’t blocked and your inbox isn’t full. If it persists, I can escalate this to our network team.

text: How can I port my number to your network?
reply: You can send an SMS ‘PORT <your number>’ to 1900. Once you receive the UPC code, visit our store or website to complete porting.

text: The recharge failed but the money was deducted.
reply: Sorry about that. Please share the transaction ID and we’ll verify and issue a refund within 2–3 working days.

text: My WiFi speed is too slow to even stream a video.
reply: Please restart your router and check again. If the issue persists, I can schedule a technician visit.

text: Can I convert my prepaid number to postpaid?
reply: Yes, you can easily convert to postpaid using our app or by visiting the nearest store. Want me to show the steps?

text: I lost my phone, please block my SIM immediately.
reply: I'm sorry to hear that. Please confirm your registered number and ID proof so I can block the SIM right away for your safety.

text: The customer care executive was rude.
reply: I apologize for that experience. I’ll escalate this to our quality team and ensure corrective action is taken.

text: I was charged for data even though I had WiFi on.
reply: Please check if mobile data was active in the background. I can still raise a review request for incorrect data charges.

text: Please share available family plans.
reply: We offer several family plans with shared data and discounts. Would you like me to list them with pricing details?
